# kernel.txt
TMP4="rpi4"
TMP4v7="rpi4v7"
TMP3="rpi3"
TMP3v7="rpi3v7"
TMP0="rpi0"
DEF="../defconfig"
PAT="../patches"
CC="../patches/cc"
NC="../patches/nc"
BD="../files/builddeb"
# do not edit above this line

# kernel
KERNEL="linux-rpi"
VERSION="5.4.y"
CORES=`nproc`

# 1 = active
# 0 = inactive
foundation_defconfig=1
lessfoundation_defconfig=0
menuconfig=0
native=0
crosscompile=1

# user defconfig must be in defconfig directory
custom_defconfig=0
MYCONFIG="nameofyour_defconfig"
